content.question: If a binding minimum wage increases in a perfectly competitive labor market, then which of the following will likely occur in the labor market?

choices.label: The supply of workers will increase.
The supply of workers will decrease.
The demand for workers will increase.
The demand for workers will decrease.
The quantity of workers supplied will increase.

content.answer: The quantity of workers supplied will increase.

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
